website_summaries.verdict: A great source of omega-3s from wild-caught fish for a little less than the priciest brands. If you want quality that fits a little better with your budget, check these out.
pros: You'll get 1,400 mg of omega-3 fatty acids in each 2-softgel dose of this fish oil
Buyers praise the coating that not only prevents fish burps, but also keeps the softgels from sticking together
cons: Still a bit of an investment when compared to other brands, but the quality is great

website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a top-notch omega 3 supplement to help fight inflammation and plaque buildup, this high-potency formulation is hard to beat.
pros: Naturally sourced from wild fish and specially formulated for rapid absorption
Enteric coating further aids absorption and eliminates fishy aftertaste and burping
Provides higher than average levels of omega 3 fatty acids for improved heart, brain, and joint health
Extensively tested for safety and quality
cons: Capsules are a bit large and can be difficult to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Quality control problems. Sometimes whole bottle is unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product a few times. The latest bottle came and all of the capsules were oily on the exterior of the capsules and smelled rancid. They had a very strong bitter flavor and I couldn’t use an entire new bottle. No refund offered when I contacted the company about the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stfortn - male born in 1988

customer_reviews.title: Huh? Not a trick, this is worrisome to me.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this product but just now opened the box to find this... Uh, I don't think so! I'm not about to put any of these in my mouth. Looks like someone put a thumb thru the foil. Tried to send this pic to the manufacturer but couldn't find an email address. I'm very surprised to find this since the product had more stars from more customers than the brand I intended to buy. A bit unnerving, yeah?
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Real reason for all the great reviews !!
customer_reviews.text: When the bottle arrived it had an offer for a free bottle if I would write a review. Who doesn't want a free bottle. That's why you see all the great reviews. Smart idea, but if it's so great, why the free bottle offer?? It's the same with the other Dr. Tobias supplements. Think about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: American Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great source of fish oil, but it contains SOY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great source of fish oil. I think the fish oil in of itself is pure, but when I read the label again I see that it is packaged in soy oil which may be in the natural vitamin E (remember natural doesn't always mean good for you). I have learned the hard way to stay away from ALL soy products. I am disappointed that yet another product I love has this ingredient in it. I have had to switch to a different fish oil brand that specifically says it does not contain soy. I would switch back to Dr. Tobias Fish Oil if they discontinue use of any soy ingredient in their product.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: I think this is worth taking.
customer_reviews.text: I might be imagining it but my neck & knees are far less stiff since I began taking this supplement. I am not sure if it's this, or this combined with Dr. T's turmeric extract. Some fish oil supplements upset my stomach. This does not.
customer_reviews.author: MadamL

customer_reviews.title: No burps! Arthritis gone!
customer_reviews.text: Doctor ordered me to take fish oil for high triglycerides. Was dreading it because all others that I have tried produced disgusting burps/diarrhea. These taste great, go down easy, no burps or stomach upset. As an added bonus, after one week of taking them, my arthritis has disappeared. I take as directed, 2 pills, 3 times a day, with a meal. Thank God for these miracle pills!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bad fish oil
customer_reviews.text: I tested an opened tablet on styrofoam and the oil ate through it within five minutes. Looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Chronic Depression Gone
customer_reviews.text: I believe this fish oil is the reason I have found relief from my chronic depression. I try one item at a time, and have tried various herbal supplements for years, but not until I tried this fish oil did I finally find relief from my overwhelming depression. I take one capsule twice a day. I am not on any medications, although I tried them and they did not work for me. I am very glad this fish oil does work for me and my depression. It has no after taste and no burping effects. There is no fish taste. I will keep taking since it is a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: A huge plus is that the capsules are easy to swallow and are Burpless
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs to take fish oil for her dry eyes. The Dr Tobias triple strength Omega-3 fish oil caps has greatly improved her condition, and she doesn't have to use nearly the amount of eye drops she was using. A huge plus is that the capsules are easy to swallow and are Burpless.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Helps with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I love this fish oil I research products extensively before purchasing, and this product is worth the cost. There is no after taste, and it is easy to swallow. I suffer from anxiety, and things had gotten better for awhile. In the last month the anxiety had gotten worse, and I realized the one thing that had changed was I had stopped taking this fish oil I had run out of it, and I decided not to spend the money on it again. Then I remembered reading about the effects fish oil can have on anxiety. So I re-ordered it, and I won't stop taking this again. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this fish oil. My doctor recommended fish oil for my fibromyalgia since I have a lot of inflammation. I take 2 softgels 2x a day per his recommendation and have noticed a huge difference in how I feel. My back used to spasm and cramp so bad I couldn't work, but since taking this, my back hasn't bothered me. I highly recommend it, and to take it with food. It makes me nauseous otherwise, but that's fish oil in general.
customer_reviews.author: Mehgan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust internet reviews.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product because the one we used to buy was suddenly overpriced and out of stock. Dr. Tobias has the same specification...except it also contained soy...so we figured we would give it a try. It’s seems clear that this product is not well regulated. All of the benefits that we used to get from fish oil were gone. This product seemed to have no positive effects whatsoever. We opted for yet a third Brand and are starting to see positive results again. Dr. Tobias has good ratings on the internet, but based on my experience, I don’t know why. I think they need a quality review. There are better quality products for less $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper RY

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am going through menopause. I am of average weight and am relatively healthy with no serious health concerns but nonetheless I opted not to undergo HRT. I suffer from dry eye and was also having some dry skin and hair loss as well as the most uncomfortable bloating. My gyn recommended Fish Oil due to my age. After a couple of weeks of 1/day I noticed I was not using my eye drops as often. I eased into 2/day and the bloating is almost nonexistent and my skin feels better. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mo S

customer_reviews.title: Lowers Cholesterol
customer_reviews.text: I started using dr Tobias fish oil in January 2017 after I got my cholesterol checked. At that time Total cholesterol was 218,hdl 51,ldl 154. After taking Dr Tobias fish oil for 6 months I had my cholesterol rechecked. WOW! Total cholesterol 202, hdl 59, ldl 132! I did increase my exercise but I feel like this fish oil deserves most of the credit! I will take it indefinitely!
customer_reviews.author: kteedoff

customer_reviews.title: Triglycerides back to normal within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Dr. Tobias Omega 3 Fish Oil after doing some research to find out what I can take to combat high triglycerides while taking accutane. I’ve been taking it for approximately two weeks and my high triglycerides went from 175 (high) to 83 (normal). Needless to say, I am very pleased. There is no fishy smell or bad aftertaste. I keep them in the freezer to ensure their freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Coupon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Must read!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take this every day. I had food poisoning today (not because of the pills) and puked up this pill. ...... Problem is I took it 12 hours ago. I take a lot of supplements and vitimins and have never had one that takes more than a couple hours to digest. I pay a lot for good quality supplements and this is beyond disappointing. There is no way this is benefiting anyone if it takes more than 12 hours to digest. I take this to keep my health in check, so unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Capsules do not digest! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. For a couple weeks I have been wondering why I have had stomach problems. I “got sick” and only water and these two lovely items came up. (Sorry, it’s gross but wanted to show). These casings never even started to process digesting in my system .... 11 1/2 hours after I have taken! This cannot be safe or healthy for anyone’s digestive system!!
customer_reviews.author: roxychic802

customer_reviews.title: Reverse Osmosis Does Not Remove Some Toxins
customer_reviews.text: Bought several bottles of this thinking it was the best I could get, but even the best filtration methods cannot remove heavy metal and other toxins. I take an algae-based EPA/DHA Omega 3 supplement. Would rather have less EPA/DHA than have a risk of toxins. Yuck... Nothing against this brand, our oceans and lakes are just too polluted to assume fish oil is safe. Plus I'm pretty sure animal products can be harmful too. My $0.02.
customer_reviews.author: Stmpls

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been skeptical about supplements and if they really do any good. I can tell you that these WORK for me. They help with my joints and my memory/concentration. If I realize I'm feeling a bit scatter-brained, it's because I've forgotten to taken this. After I was confident that the fish oil was helping me, I tried a less expensive brand that had good reviews but they did not work as well and gave me fish burps if I didn't take them with a large meal. These are better absorbed when taken with food but I don't get the fishy burps/taste even when I take them on an empty stomach. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracyb972

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control - Bad Batches!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one bottle in January and it worked great. I bought my next bottle in March and get the worst fish burps ever. I even double checked the packaging to make sure I ordered the right one. It's exactly the same, by the bottle at least, but definitely not by the product. I won't be trying this again, I'll go back to Nature Made Burp-Less Fish Oil. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews I decided to order these supplements. I have nothing but good things to say and would highly recommend if you are wanting to take a fish oil. They are easy to swallow and there is no unpleasant after taste as with other fish oil supplements I have tried. Since starting these supplements my joint discomfort has practically disappeared! I use to have such stiffness in my knees upon waking up in the morning and now I don’t. They have also eliminated my hot flashes that I was experiencing due to peri menopause. They have given me back my life! Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Jn

customer_reviews.title: Is this still NSF certified?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these Omega-3 pills since they were using the dark blue-translucent bottle because it used to be NSF certified, but the new bottle that I just got (with the new branding) doesnt have the NSF logo on there and I cant seem to find the cert on the NSF website. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: A. Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Cholesterol improved!
customer_reviews.text: My Dr. recommended I start taking CO Q10 and fish oil after several tests coming back showing elevated cholesterol. I added one other supplement (CO Q10) that I had already been taking a bit of from another source before, and adding in the fish oil was the major change made. After three months, my next bloodwork showed the LDL was down 53 points from the previous quarter and 62 points over the last year. I think this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Fish Oil supplements for the last 15 years and have used several brands. Dr. Tobias brand is as billed and arrived as promised. The tablets are consistent with other brands I've used, but these don't have an after taste like some do. They seem to work as well or better than others I've taken and the price/value ratio is great. Will be reordering and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and honest Seller
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients of this Omega 3 oil. I’ve had a mild heart attack 8 years ago and by taking natural products that are both blood thinning and heart healthy I’ve been able to have no further problems without being on any prescribed meds like statins or beta blockers. So far so good. I’m going to stick with good products like this one. I gave 4 stars only because my wife finds she doesn’t digest this oil well and burps it up. I didn’t find that at all but wanted to be honest.

customer_reviews.title: My doctor is very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.text: This is a long term process to see the benefits from taking these tablets. From the first time since I have been having my cholesterol check my doctor reports the following three positive lave results. 1) Overall cholesterol is at or around 120. 2) My good cholesterol is up. 3) My bad cholesterol is down. I finally have all three going for me at the same time. I was never able to achieve numbers 2 and 3 before taking these pills. It took a little over a year, of taking one tablet daily, before my numbers really changed.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar 38

customer_reviews.title: First time was good and it made me want to purchase their product ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 times of this item. First time was good and it made me want to purchase their product again. The 2nd time it arrived with a very pale color compared to the first time and when I tried to take the pill I ended up spitting it out as it was extremely bitter which made me suspicious. The content of the capsule were extremely liquid and I ended up throwing the entire thing away. There was no noticeable damage on the seal but I'm not sure if I inspected it good enough. One thing I'm sure of is that I have 30$ in my trashcan right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jovy Z

customer_reviews.title: Helps with attention and focus
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my extremely scatterbrained but smart 9 year old son for about 2 months now. I saw some effects after a couple of weeks, but now, after 2 months, he’s a different child. He thinks before he acts, learns from his mistakes, doesn’t forget nearly as much as he used to, and even his grades have improved. It seems to be the “link” that he has been missing in his brain (ie quality neurotransmitter- aiding supplement). We’ve tried so many things- therapy, diet changes, elimination diets, changes in parenting, etc...but refuse to medicate with dangerous stimulants. Dr Tobias’ Omega 3 is the only thing that has helped. Hallelujah!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Has soy in it
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these fish oil soft gels for years, but sadly never read the label very carefully until now. I just noticed that soy is listed among the ingredients. I've been researching fish oil in more detail, and apparently some manufacturers use soy to process their oil. I have discontinued the use of these soft gels and will be switching to a soy-free brand.
customer_reviews.author: bkadct

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  I like it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I haven't noticed any fish burps or other obvious problems with this product, and it seems to be working well. We use this as an accompaniment to a prescription for omega-3. The pharmacy version is more expensive, and this helps stretch our dollars, as it seems to have as much or more of the beneficial ingredients (DHA and EPA) as the prescribed brand. I also appreciate the opportunity to request a free bottle after a couple of weeks of use, though I don't know how long that offer will be available. This product does contain bovine gelatin, in case that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: hybroanglid

customer_reviews.title: I "Love" Fish Burps" All Day with Dr. Tobias
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several versions of Omega 3 Fish Oil. This, by far, was the worst for "fish burps!" Want fishy burps throughout your day, buy this product. I never write negative reviews, but wanted to warn others before being fooled. I did try this product until the bottle was empty but it was consistent in offering a foul taste.
customer_reviews.author: Father Bowdern

customer_reviews.title: MORE OMEGA 3 FOR YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: After turning 50, I decided to start taking vitamins. Using Dr. Oz's Ultimate Supplement checklist for women, I noticed that Fish Oils brands are very different in the levels of DHA & EPA which reduce arterial inflammation and are essential for optional functioning of the brain and heart. Dr. Oz suggests 600mg of DHA. Dr. Tobias brand contains 600mg DHA & 800mg EPA per serving. To compare, Kirkland Fish Oil has combined 300mg of DHA & EPA per serving. I don't know about you but if I'm going to choke down fish oil, I want it to count. And, I have never had "fish burps"! I've been buying this brand for years and don't even want to try anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Has an unexpected benefit!
customer_reviews.text: I initially took it to help lower my "bad" cholesterol and raise my "good" cholesterol. I don't know if it's done that yet; I haven't had any new blood work since I started taking it. But an unexpected benefit is that my joints feel better using the product. I didn't realize that was a benefit until I started taking it, but I can certainly feel it! I can't wait to have my cholesterol tested again in a few months. Based on everything I've read, this should help. Even though my numbers are already good, I'm trying for great!
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: Where is this made?
customer_reviews.text: You know, I doubt products that don't espouse the credibility of the manufacturer. I buy mostly name brand products and big label food companies. I have my suspicions about Dr. Tobias. I don't see any pharmaceutical testing. I have a heartburn right after taking one with a banana and a large glass of water. Remember when the. Chinese Dog food had melamine. I don't like this company right out of the box! I think I will consume this box and chalk it upon as my own stupidity. Back to mainstream suppliers and mainstream manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Barry A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seems good I sufffer from depression and anxiety personality disorder and these are like gods magic pills to me. Anyways I’ll update you in 3 months on how they work. I take 2 before bed everyday it’s kinda hard for me to take one in the morning and one at night cause of my sleep schedule so I just take two before sleep. Anyways don’t hesitate to buy these they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RANCID “Acidic” Oil - cut one open!!!
customer_reviews.text: POOR product quality. I have used a few fish oil products and never experienced such questionable health considerations. The oil is not digestible - passes through in an unpleasant way. :-(. I am not certain the oil is fit for human or animal consumption and I would not give it to my dogs. I opened a capsule to observe the contents and found an acidic, perhaps rancid, chemically altered or mis-processed oil. Slightly burned my mouth when I tasted it. CUT one open and see you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: This product has worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 1 month now. My knees were "popping & cracking" going up and down stairs. On day 4 of taking the recommended dosage I noticed that the "popping & cracking" stopped! I also have arthritis in my hands and my thumbs become worse with weather changes. The product has helped my hands, but not altogether. They do not swell as much and sometimes my thumbs still ache.
customer_reviews.author: Staglady

customer_reviews.title: Is the capsule made of plastic?
customer_reviews.text: I was curious as to why I’m not burping the scent of the fish oil and decided to cut one of the capsules. It astonished me to see how hard it is to cut. The shell feels like plastic. Does this shell really dissolves in the stomach or is it passed out in the stool? I’m not going to swallow these anymore and opted to buy the liquid instead from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Garrie

customer_reviews.title: Fish oil
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be good but I won't know how effective it is until I take a blood test. Will it deal with inflammation? There is no fish oil reflux which is a positive thing. The enteric coating has a frosted look and a powdery feel. There is nothing in the description to indicate whether the coating is natural or synthetic. A natural coating would be an alginate and natural food glaze. A synthetic coating would be methacrylic acid polymer, and the coating spray painted. The EPA-DHA ratio is excellent. This product contains soy and that's a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: MeWorry?Gal

customer_reviews.title: Foul odor and already opened!
customer_reviews.text: The product had a plastic “safety seal” around the cap, but when I opened it, there was a partially opened seal inside that had been ripped off previously...mysterious brown smudges on the bottle and a terrible fish odor. These must have been repackaged after an expiration date. Too bad I am only now opening and can’t report it!
customer_reviews.author: Postman

customer_reviews.title: the second bottle smelled just fine, barely an odor
customer_reviews.text: The product had gone rancid. It had an overwhelming rotten smell (not the normal fish oil smell). It was my first time ordering this brand, so I didn't want to assume. I ordered a second bottle just to compare the two. Sure enough, the second bottle smelled just fine, barely an odor. I understand the occasional mistake. What I don't understand is the companies refusal to refund. It seems to be something in their policy that I missed. I will be going back to the tried and true Nordic Naturals.
customer_reviews.author: streem

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Ever Felt
customer_reviews.text: Lately I've felt the best I ever have in my life. I have more energy, I'm happier, I have better mental clarity, I feel more at peace, I'm more confident. I was thinking through what I've changed lately, and all I can think is that this all started around the same time I began taking this supplement. As someone who has already makes a lot of choices to prioritize health in my life, I'm amazed at what a significant change it seems I've had from just adding one little supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: No Burps!
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor suggested taking Omega 3 so I chose these fish oil softgels based on their reviews. I am not sure if they work for pain relief, but they live up to their claim of "no fish burps" and I will be interested to see if they help to lower my bad cholesterol and raise the good cholesterol. I have a very sensitive stomach but I had no problem taking two of these per day as recommended. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Improved Health & Well-Being w/No Fishy Smell or After-Taste
customer_reviews.text: After experiencing positive benefits and success with Dr. Tobias' Turmeric product, I decided to add Dr. Tobias' Omega-3 Fish Oil to my daily regimen. Thus far, I am quite pleased with the my first bottle, purchased a while back and just this week purchased another full bottle. I believe it is adding to my well-being and also delivers on the promise of having virtually zero after-taste or fish smell when taking. For me... This is another Top Quality product from Dr. Tobias, which, like the Turmeric 15X, I've shared with many friends and colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: NostraD

customer_reviews.title: Pure product
customer_reviews.text: I did the test that my doctor advised me to do to make sure the omega 3 fish oil was pure. I opened one of the capsules and poured the fish oil in a styrofoam cup. If the it causes the cup to melt then it is pure fish oil. Also, anchovy oil is better for your body to absorb than Salmon oil. I also was advised by my doctor to take 6,000 mg a day and these capsules are 2,000 mg and I only have to take 3 of them instead of 6 of the usual 1,000 mg.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Reeves

customer_reviews.title: good morning. First of all I would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi Dr. Tobias, good morning. First of all I would like to thank for a bottle of the Omega 3 Fish Oil. So I am using now my 2cd bottle, and when finished the first bottle I made blood exam and my triglycerides went down from 376 to 156. Thank you very much for this. Jocélia Souza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. It's helped me with a skin condition called Rosacea. It usually manifests itself as redness of the skin and sensitivity to sunlight. In my case, I've had terrible acne for which doctors prescribed heavy antibiotics. As soon as I was off Doxicyclin the acne and redness returned. My doctor suggested taking fish oil, instead of heavy meds, for life. This product hit the spot! No more acne, no more dry skin. I take two pills, twice a day and just like other reviewers wrote - no fishy after-taste.
customer_reviews.author: rain_drop

customer_reviews.title: Great for Post Partum
customer_reviews.text: I have used Dr. Tobias Omega 3 before and felt great. I battle with depression and anxiety. I ran out of the fish oil for a couple months and noticed I was feeling depressed and anxious. I ordered again and after a couple weeks back on it I feel calm, happy and much more patient. I have never experience any unpleasant fish taste and really can feel a difference when I take the Dr. Tobias Triple Strength fish oil. Great product and I recommend everyone take it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy and beyond
customer_reviews.text: I have taken the product since my first pregnancy 4 years ago. I opted to take omega 3s for the benefits to baby. I have continued because I think it’s healthy, I’m still nursing, I don’t get enough fish in my diet, and there’s no fishy taste like others. Both my children’s skin is fantastic, I’m not sure if it is related to the omega 3s or not. Even when I had severe morning sickness, I could still manage these. I have no idea how I would feel if I stopped taking these. They are very easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: No smell, definitely notice a difference, great concentration!
customer_reviews.text: 1) No Smell 2) No Smell 3) No smell Okay, this has incredibly concentrated amounts of omega 3s, and it won't leave you burping fish up. I have been using these for two weeks, and I can definitely tell a difference in my skin. I have celiacs disease, so I am constantly dry-skinned and failing to absorb proper nutrients. I swear my skin is already less ashy, my joints are less swollen, and I feel better over-all. BUY THE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby C.

customer_reviews.title: A total ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they are described to be 180 2000 mg. fish oil capsules which they are not. They are 180 1000 mg. capsules which means they cost well over twice what they should. In order to get the 2000 mg. one must take two per day so this is a 90 day supply only. This is somewhere between outright fraud and a big scam, neither of which I’m happy to have been the victim.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Russell

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: Ive taken these pills with dinner the last 4 nights. And now 2 of those times, I have woken in the middle of the night feeling very nauseated with my insides churning. This fish oil pill is the only thing that has changed in my routine. Wish i could return.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok but...
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok, but I prefer my NG360 Multivitamin with Coq10 and Apple Cider Vinegar. I am giving the product a 5 star because the customer service is excellent and the product itself does what its' supposed to do, but it's not the same as taking a complete multivitamin supplement like NG360. Overall, I will recommend this product for some who just wants Fish Oil or Omega 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but free bottle offer is kind of a scam
customer_reviews.text: The fish oil product is very good. I have taken it for about a year and never any fishy taste or burps. HOWEVER, the "free bottle" offer is somewhat of a scam. The offer makes it sound like you get a free bottle of fish oil but that is not the case. Once you fill in the first screen of information, you find out that you can only select from a list of other products. Fish oil product is fine, but 4 star rating is for deceptive marketing of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A friend/nurse highly recommended that I take these for my joint pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m always hesitant to take omegas because of the fishy burp, especially with my crazy reflux the last couple of years! A friend/nurse highly recommended that I take these for my joint pain and said they do NOT have the fish burp. I gave them a try and she was right! Even with my reflux, I have not had any fishy aftertaste or burps! As far as it helping my joints, I haven’t noticed much of a difference yet, but it’s only been about 2 weeks and I have some serious joint and muscle issues so I’m going to give it a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: No fishy taste!
customer_reviews.text: When it was recommended that I take an Omega 3 supplement, I must admit that I had concerns about having a fishy aftertaste, but there was absolutely none with Dr Tobias Omega 3. Also, even though I can’t say for sure exactly when it happened, I have noticed a marked improvement in my overall joint health and at my age, that’s a pretty big deal. The size of the capsule is quite intimidating but surprisingly, it slides down very easily. I’m definitely re-ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Winger

customer_reviews.title: Dishonest listing
customer_reviews.text: This product is listed as 2,000mg Fish Oil. It is not. It is 1,000mg fish oil. They're listing the "serving size" and have increased the serving to two pills to mislead customers into believing the dose per pill is higher than it actually is. This makes it more labor intensive to compare products and tricks customers.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of knee pain, and I'd say since I have been using this product, I do notice a reduction in that pain, especially on stairs. Its also seems to be lowering my blood pressure (which was borderline and now is normal), both systolic and diastolic by about 10 points each. Of course I can't 100% certify that this is the cause of the improvements, or if it is some placebo effect, or just me trying to live a healthier lifestyle, but I'm going to stick with it for a while and see if things continue to improve.
customer_reviews.author: S. Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Raised my LDL cholesterol!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this in June, and my LDL went from 122 (June 1) to 144 (August 20)! I was eating mostly vegetarian with an occasional (1-2 per week) serving of fish or chicken during that time. With research online, I found that fish oil can raise your LDL (the bad!) cholesterol. Also, this bottle says 2000 mg of fish oil per serving, but only 1400 mg of EPA and DHA, so the rest must be just fish fat with no benefit. I am stopping this now.
customer_reviews.author: Westport Reader

customer_reviews.title: not too sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take omega 3 supplements for many reasons but one is relief from dry eye. Our last omega 3 supplement from Solger was much better at reaving these symptoms. We plan on upping our dose of this product to see if that does the trick. I just went to the web site and put in for our free bottle so we'll have a good supply to go through before switching back if that is what we choose.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product to help bring my cholesterol down from 245 to at least 199 and this one actually got me down to 216 in only 3 weeks without changing my diet I know if I eat better I’ll get there sooner than later
customer_reviews.author: aleeshaS

customer_reviews.title: Capsules are leaking.
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered these 3-4 times and this last batch is leaking the capsules themselves are leaking. My husband will not take them because the oil he gets on his hands smells like fish oil plus he can't stomach the taste going down. Prior to this order we have had zero issues so we do like this product but the leaking from the capsules needs to be looked at by the company. I passed the date of return because we were finishing up the prior bottle we ordered. I wish we could get a replacement bottle at this point. btw they were stored on the our counter and we have ac so no excessive heat involved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received properly sealed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received properly sealed!!! Have not started these yet, I still have some left in my other brand. However, the value is amazing!! I will post again after starting these!! Compare the prices, you will see the amazing value!! PS: I have started taking these. These are just too big for me to swallow. When they are all gone, I will try to find much smaller ones... I will post again after my Dr visit blood work is back. I take these for my Cholesterol, Triglycerides, etc. This was the first time ordering this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patinal

customer_reviews.title: No fishy burps, as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my third bottle of these- they’re great. All the other brands I have tried claimed to give no fishy burps and every single one of them did exactly that. With these I have had one very mild fishy burp every few months. It’s very rare. When I take these regularly I notice that my skin is softer and stays moisturized more easily. In addition to the invisible health benefits this is a nice perk. I’ll continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller capsules are easy to swallow and have no bad effect on stomach. Have great amount of EPA, DHA. FANTASTIC QUALITY! Will order again! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nana Banana

customer_reviews.title: These were a life saver for my mental health!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was at wits end with anxiety/depression symptoms. I tried other supplements to help relieve my symptoms but to no avail. I'm not a religious fanatic but I whispered a prayer over these these capsules. I literally noticed a difference after the 1st dosage. Some pretty crazy events have occured since my 1st dose (2 weeks ago) and instead of spiraling out of control, I can calmly seek a resolution. This is the best I've felt in years!!! I'm currently working from home with a hyperactive toddler and a rebellious teenager yet I'm at complete peace!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha J.

customer_reviews.title: Eye Doctor Recommends This Ratio
customer_reviews.text: My primary care physician and my ophthalmologist have recommended the Omega 3 Fish Oils. Apparently, the ratio of EPA and DHA is important, and my eye doctor is thrilled I chose this brand. It's particularly good for eye health, dry eye syndrome, etc. It's more expensive, but I take only 2 capsules unlike other brands.
customer_reviews.author: marymorstan

customer_reviews.title: REFUND
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fogginess of the outside coating looks like it could be an expired, not to mention I put 1 capsule in water to see how long it would resolve it never resolved therefore, I don't want tons of capsules sitting in my stomach not dissolving.
customer_reviews.author: ttbaby

customer_reviews.title: THESE REALLY DON’T GIVE YOU INDIGESTION OR AN AFTERTASTE!
customer_reviews.text: I was told to take fish oil to help with dry eyes by my ophthalmologist. I tried several brands but could not stand the indigestion and aftertaste they gave me. Then I found this brand on Amazon and decided to try one more time. BINGO! No indigestion, no aftertaste and they truly do help my dry eyes feel better. The only semi-negative thing I can say about this product is that the capsules are a little large but they help my eyes so much, I can overlook that ;)
customer_reviews.author: NINGA1

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Health Benefits with Dr. Tobias
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 other highly-regarded fish oil supplements in the past and never noticed the benefits that I've been experiencing since consuming the Dr. Tobias brand. I have had more mental clarity and a "balanced" outlook on life which i didn't have with either of the previous 2 brands. In addition, the dosage of those brands was the same as this product, and I was taking 2 of those capsules per day. With Dr. Tobias, I only take 1 capsule per day and it has made a positive difference in my overall well-being. I highly recommend this brand of fish oil!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: They do have a fishy taste. If your really sensitive to it like I am!
customer_reviews.text: The first week I thought these were a miracle. I hate at things “fishy”. That includes ALL Omega fish oils. All the reviews made me give it a try and sure enough the first 3-4 days I took them they had 0 fish taste. But then day 5 I started tasting it, and burping it, ugh nasty. After a month my husband dad quit taking them as well because they started making him sick.
customer_reviews.author: R Blanke

customer_reviews.title: Mood Booster + Mental clarity
customer_reviews.text: I have mild ADD that makes it hard for me to focus on tasks at hand. This omega-3 supplement helps combat that, I can focus better for longer periods of time, and to top it all off, my overall mood has improved (i use a daily mood tracker) since I started using this. No fish burps. The supply I got smells fresh and I keep it in the fridge. My body adjusted on the first couple of days (stool was softer than usual) but has now returned to normal. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Tranquilino

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Seems To Have Gone Down Hill
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this fish oil a total of 6 times now. The first 5 orders were fine, not a hint of fish smell. The last order, however, reeked with an extremely strong odor of fish. Every time I swallow one of the gel tablets I nearly gag. If they weren’t so expensive, I’d throw this bottle away. Now that I’m almost done with this order (thankfully) I’ve placed an order for a different brand (I can’t see how it could be any worse than this last order). Something has happened to their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Gaffer

customer_reviews.title: The Best 4 Many Reasons
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Omega 3 Fish Oil for about 3 weeks and I love it. I take after breakfast and dinner. The softgels are very easy to swallow and there is no fishy taste. I am keeping them in my frig due to the hot summer weather and feeling a difference in my 80 yr old body which is a definite plus. This is the best Omega 3, I have tried. I will definitely continue with Dr Tobias and will be ordering the Multi Vitamin today as well.
customer_reviews.author: SunyJan

customer_reviews.title: False marketing - no free bottle of fish oil
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product, there was a promotion to get a free bottle a few weeks after purchase. However, this is not true. When I attempt to go to the website listed on the bottle, my web browser gives me a warning that it's not safe. And when I google it and attempt to get a free bottle that way, there is no option to get a free bottle of fish oil pills; instead, your choices are a variety of things I don't want (e.g., colon health pills). False marketing!
customer_reviews.author: FroggyM

customer_reviews.title: Great medical results
customer_reviews.text: My triglyceride level had reached an extremely high level of “281”, my dr recommended taking a fish oil twice daily. I started taking Dr Tobias triple strength omega 3 fish oil and got great results, my follow up blood test 3 months later showed my triglyceride level dropped by more than half to 138. Will continue with treatment unless directed otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Everyone Needs to Supplement with Fish Oil for Good Health
customer_reviews.text: As with all supplements, time will tell. It will take at least a month to measure the fish oil effects. So far I have not experienced any fish oil burps which is a good thing. The size of the pill is easy to swallow. The product was delivered on time and securely packaged. I felt that the reviews were very positive and that is why I chose this product. I like the third party testing and the amount of DHA and EPA. The price was competitive. I would like to update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Great product once you figure out how to use it!
customer_reviews.text: The best omega 3 money can buy. Once I figured out how to use these properly it was game on! They didn’t come with directions so I thought they were supposed to be used anally. After going through 3 bottles this way, and a lengthy uncomfortable hospital trip later. I’m happy to say these are great! Luckily the fish oil wasn’t ruined and I was able to take it orally later!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rohm

customer_reviews.title: Very bad allergic reactions
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking other brands of fish oil for years. This is the first time l tried this one. After taking this fish oil the first time in the morning with my breakfast, I felt heartburn and stomachache at noon. The next morning, I got rash all over my body, and my legs got cramping and the whole body got swelling. My joints felt very painful, which made me hard to walk. I wish I could return this!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Wei

customer_reviews.title: Caused big breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after I started taking these fish oil pills I broke out terribly. When I stopped taking them, my skin cleared up again.
customer_reviews.author: k.i.a.

customer_reviews.title: Do You Suffer RFBS?
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about starting on fish oil because my wife has had bad experiences with another brand. She suffered the dreaded RFBS, (Rotten Fish Burp Syndrome). After researching this brand I decided to give it a try. I've been using it for 3 weeks now and have not had any problems with it. It seems to digest easily and has given me no fish breath. My wife has been hitting my stash and she hasn't had any problems with this one like the brand she was taking previously so life is good!
customer_reviews.author: Badpork

customer_reviews.title: Best fish oil brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of fish oil. If you've tried other brands of fish oil you are probably familiar with that fishy after taste of fishy burp. This brand does not have any of that or at least keeps it to a minimum. That only comes from high quality FRESH oil that hasn't been sitting in a warehouse waiting to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: ttsai

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for awhile now and this is probably my 4th or 5th bottle now and previously they don't smell bad or taste bad but now it smells so bad like it's rancid... even after they resend me a new one, this one didn't smell as bad as the last one but still... it has a pungent smell that is not fish. I don't care about fish smell or taste cos I actually love it. This smell... it's something else.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: A good product and company
customer_reviews.text: I tried Dr. Tobias Omega 3 fish oil, and have been happy. I needed Omega 3's, and was told to get one with DHA. So I went searching (had a hard time picking random off a shelf at CVS), so I looked online and found Dr. Tobias products on Amazon that are highly recommended. After researching I decided to give it a try. I do know there is no magic pill... and since I'm over 50, and know I do have to take better care of myself. So, so far so good with Dr. Tobias Omega 3. And no side effects, etc. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MacMyDay

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm healthy, I don't see significant change to my body, but I know fish oil is good. It has no taste, very easy to take in with water. More importantly, the daily dosage is 2g, which is just right. Daily dosage for fish oil for an adult is 1-3g. (Many other health supplements such as VC, VE, etc, are actually exceeding the suggested daily dosage, but this fish oil is allowing you to take in an amount that's just right for your body). Nice produce
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sold as "2000 mg" but be careful, Serving Size = 2 tabs (so really 1000 per tab)
customer_reviews.text: It's as good a fish oil tablet as there is, but don't be misled into thinking you're getting a double dose in each tablet. I have Sundown's Fish Oil tabs (pretty much the same thing) advertised as "1000 mg" a tablet. So, although the Dr Tobias product is good, it's essentially the same dose per tablet as any other fish oil tablet. They just suggest the serving size is "2 tablets" to achieve the "2000 mg" that's advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can now take Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: Effective and gentle to the digestive system - i had avoided omega 3 because it made me belch but my eye doctor said, emphatically, to start taking it. Didn't realize it is good for the eyes, but it has helped my blood pressure and skin problems. I am in my 70's so i need all the help i can get - Dr Tobias Omega 3 is now a regular part of my 'arsenal'
customer_reviews.author: Blakistone

customer_reviews.title: HAS SOY AS FILLERS
customer_reviews.text: Well this product has Soy ! Look at the allergies warning. If it has no fillers then why Soy is in it ? Misleading labels !
customer_reviews.author: Thuy

customer_reviews.title: Fish oil that is really PURE and  value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I am 53, and have been using different brands of fish oil, krill oil for at least 3 years. I came across Dr Tobias Omega 3 Fish Oil Triple Strength accidentally, but it happened to be the best of the best brand ever. So i started using Dr Tobias different products and they all stand for quality.Strongly recommend THE VERY BRAND to everyone. I am sure nobody will ever get disappointed , because it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to Omega 3 supplement. I had switched to Krill Oil for a while, but that seems more expensive and doesn't seem to deliver the quantity of fatty acids I would need to maintain a healthy Omega 3:6 ratio. I used to use another brand of Omega 3 similar to this, but the price and quality of the Dr. Tobias brand seem to be as good or better than the other brand, so I switched.
customer_reviews.author: Logical Paradox

customer_reviews.title: Not BURPLESS it's GROSS and FISHY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of its awesome reviews and because it says that it is burpless. I disagree, I have burped up fishy tasting yucky stuff! I hate fish, I don't eat it, and I would not purchase this product ever again for this reason. Also the capsules are rather long and wide. I don't know that it did anything positive for my pain or cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: Cinderbell17

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fish Oil pills
customer_reviews.text: Sounds crazy to put that out there, right? We've been using fish oil supplements for years now. We switched to the Dr. Tobias brand earlier this year and have been very happy with it. There is no fish smell or taste. The pills are easy to take. After trying these, we went ahead and set them up as Subscribe & Save to make it easy to receive each month. Since starting with these, we've also started to look at other Dr. Tobias brand supplements as part of our routine.
customer_reviews.author: imapayne

customer_reviews.title: Great EPA and DHA levels
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand and didn't realize the levels of EPA and DHA were not even close to levels that would be beneficial. I started taking Dr. Tobias brand and right away I could just feel a difference...my skin has had no blemishes and I feel more alert since I started taking these. I can't wait to see how they will effect my cholesterol. I will definitely keep using this product and also recommend it to my family and friends. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: aMUSEd

customer_reviews.title: Good, burp-less fish gels
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking fish oil for a couple of years because the internet tells me to. The Omega-3 is supposed to be good for me and fish oil is supposed to make me smarter. The intelligence enhancement must be subtle, because I haven't felt a difference yet, but I am patient. I've tried several different brands and these are hands-down the most burp-less gels I've ever used. They are more expensive than most, but if you hate the burps, these are the ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Omega 3 source, and no burps or fishy aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I have Hashimoto, and repeated low LDL in blood tests for several years. I tried to bring it up with other sources rich in omega 3 as well with supplements from other manufacturers but this brand is the only one that helped so far. I feel energized, more focused and overall healthier and in better mood. While other says there’s no burps or fishy aftertaste this brand is the only one I really didn’t experienced any of it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: FemaleDog(-:

customer_reviews.title: Substandard product
customer_reviews.text: I've used Nordic natural for years with no problems and decided to try Dr Tobias which was a bad idea. I developed intestinal distress within days which would not go away so I eliminated my supplements one by one and when I stopped Tobias fish oil my problems subsided. I am intolerant of soy and from what I understand Tobias fish oil contains soy, something that in my opinion, doesn't belong in fish oil. Needless to say, I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: It Works for Joint Pain
customer_reviews.text: I started having stiffness in my thumb since turning age 60 and researched to find that fish oil is recommended to treat this condition. My research led me to Dr. Tobias Triple Strength Omega 3 fish oil and I'm very pleased with the outcome. After taking for about 3 weeks I definitely could feel the positive results. I'm now on my second bottle and the joint stiffness and pain is gone. If you take this supplement as suggested and adjust your diet to exclude foods that cause inflammation, you will not be disappointed. I only take 2 per day.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Generous single dose and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried many brands of fish oil. This one does it for me. I see a difference in arthritis pain and carpal tunnel syndrome. I give it to my dog as well who tore his knee. I have him o conservative management and this is one of the top things I give him and see result in his walk. Less stiffness, especially in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Jucelle

customer_reviews.title: Work great coping with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this after reading some of the potential benefits it could provide to coping with anxiety. Wow, is all I have to say. I have GAD and after taking these it’s all but gone. I never would have believed it myself but I’m loving life. I previously struggled with word recall, had difficulty dealing with difficult conversations, public speaking and overal nervousness. Within about a week of taking these I noticed all of these symptoms completely vanish. Absolute lifesavers
customer_reviews.author: Box Hill Crew

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sizes easier to swallow. No fishy burps. No Mercury
customer_reviews.text: The enteric coating seems to reduce fishy burps. The shape of the pill is easier for my wife to swallow than some of the other brands that I've tried. The molecular distillation gives me more confidence that it does not have mercury or other toxins in it. Will it make me live to 100 years old? We will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Weathers, Ph.D. (Consignment)

product_meta.title: Dr Tobias Omega 3 Fish Oil Triple Strength, 2,000mg, Burpless, Non-GMO, NSF-Certified (180 Softgels)
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY & TRIPLE STRENGTH: 2,000 mg of fish oil delivering 1,400 mg of Omega-3's (800 mg EPA, 600 mg DHA) per serving.
DESIGNED FOR BETTER ABSORPTION & NO FISHY AFTERTASTE: Enteric coating for better absorption of the essential fatty acids resulting in no fishy aftertaste or burps.
100% NON-GMO WILD-CAUGHT FISH: Sourced from fresh wild-caught fish in an FDA registered & inspected GMP-certified facility.
ULTIMATE PURIFICATION: Purified using molecular distillation to remove heavy metals, PCB's & other toxins.
LONG SHELF LIFE: 3rd party tested for product purity, effectiveness, ingredient safety, nutritional value and label accuracy. The highest standard guaranteed.
